new.Description:
The most concentrated form of Slug Slime.
The energy from it can be used in varying ways, be it in the form of heat or electromagnetic radiation.

Charging Power Shard Fragments with this energy leads to the creation of Power Shards.

old.Description:
The most concentrated form of Slug Slime.
The energy from it can be used in varying ways, be it in the form of heat, electromagnetic fields or radiation.

Charging Power Shard Fragments with this energy leads to the creation of Power Shards.

original.Name: Energized Slug Slime
original.Description:
The most concentrated form of Slug Slime.
The energy from it can be used in varying ways, be it in the form of heat or electromagnetic radiation.

Charging Power Shard Fragments with this energy leads to the creation of Power Shards.
